description.full: Single Player, Xbox Live Multiplayer 1-4, HD (High Definition). Can’t get enough brawling and shooting action? Buy Small Arms™ to unlock all the levels, characters, and mini games. Get linked into the Small Arms community and earn a Six Degrees of Small Arms achievement! Can you beat the single-player mission? Conquer your friends on your couch or over Xbox Live®? Are you ready to check the leaderboards and claim your bragging rights? Then don’t delay - buy Small Arms now! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Brace yourself -- you’re about to be blasted away by Small Arms! Jump between platforms and obliterate your enemies with 360 degree aim. Frantic multiplayer brawling action and the precision of an arcade shooter meet in this intense side scrolling adventure. Immerse yourself in the densely detailed levels and cast of renegade characters. Why wait? Download the trial version now.
